document_data.caption: A map showing Belzound Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Belzound Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Belzound Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Belzound Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road branched south from [[Tarsar's Street]] and joined with [[Suldown Street]] after a short distance.
document_data.Notable Locations: A surface shaft connecting to [[Waterdeep/Sewers|Waterdeep's sewers]] was located along the midpoint of Belzound Street.<ref name=WatN-p28"> The [[Roaringhorn Villa|noble villa]] for the [[Roaringhorn (Waterdeep)|Roaringhorn]] family was located on the west side of the street.
